message.body: Good morning! Sorry I didn't call last night-passed out on the couch after eating pie. Do you want to meet for lunch this afternoon? I was thinking possibly somewhere in the royersford/collegeville/trappe area since it's somewhat in between. There's a nice Thai/Japanese place called Veekoo in Royersford, unless that's too much Thai food. I spotted a nice Indian food place in trappe, too. Let me know what you think. <3 R
Yes! And! I booked a flight for march 6-15
